author: 马  培
title: 郧西香口乡成功避险2起滑坡灾害 避免6人伤亡 - 县市区动态十堰市自然资源和城乡建设局
text:
7月9日，十堰市郧西县北部香口乡、上津镇、店子镇等地突发强降雨。该县香口乡发生2起滑坡地质灾害，因提前预警、排查、转移到位，均成功避险，避免3户6人伤亡。
一、孟川村徐国田屋后滑坡成功避险，避免伤亡1户3人
7月9日8时左右，郧西县土门自然资源和规划所负责人项圆、香口乡孟川村书记张立荣，在开展地质灾害雨中巡排查时，发现该村徐国田家房屋后侧山体有岩土垮塌现象，立即组织徐国田家3人转移安置到周边安全区住户暂住。
10时40分左右，徐国田屋后山体发生滑坡，垮塌方量约500立方米，垮塌岩土体将徐国田家房屋后墙推倒，室内床、衣柜等家具被掩埋，直接经济损失约5万元。因已提前转移受威胁人员，实现成功避险，避免1户3人伤亡。
滑坡体堆积在坡脚处
岩土体砸毁墙体冲进徐国田屋内
二、湖岭村岭沟口滑坡成功避险，避免伤亡2户3人
7月9日13时40分，郧西县香口乡湖岭村网格员柯昌平在巡查时，发现该村岭沟口滑坡局部发生变形，迅速组织周边6户10人撤离到安全区域，并在危险区域拉起警戒线、悬挂警示标识。15时30分，岭沟口滑坡发生较大规模垮塌，垮塌方量约3000立方米，损毁刘家富、刘家华两户房屋3间，造成经济损失约8万元。
目前，郧西县政府已妥善安置两起地质灾害受威胁群众，并对危险区域进行封闭，在影响区周边拉设警戒线、竖立警示标志，安排专人值守，加强监测。同时，郧西县自然资源和规划局已安排地质专家现场驻守，指导地方开展排险处置工作。
滑坡体掩埋刘家华房屋
岩土体砸毁墙体冲进刘家富屋内
为有效应对地质灾害，十堰市持续巡查排查地质灾害隐患，今年已累计出动4.8万人次排查隐患2.3万处次。执行24小时值班值守和调度指挥机制，及时了解并掌握一线灾情险情。十堰市自然资源和城乡建设局会同该市气象局、省地质局地质队伍等单位开展会商，及时发布地质灾害风险预警，预警区域精准到乡镇、村、隐患点。同时，通过电话精准叫醒、叫应基层网格员，重点督促做好降雨期间各项防范应对工作。
今年以来，十堰市已成功避险4起地质灾害，避免10人伤亡。

author: Evan Wanish
title: Tampa Bay Buccaneers Week 18 Top Performers vs. Carolina Panthers - Bucs Nation
text: The Bucs did it. Tampa Bay defeated the [Carolina Panthers](https://www.catscratchreader.com/) by a score of 9-0 to win their third straight NFC South title and fourth straight playoff appearance. In an ugly game, the [Buccaneers](https://www.bucsnation.com/) were able to do just enough on offense and the defense was able to stifle the Panthers as Chase McLaughlin nailed three field goals to produce all of the Bucs points today. The biggest thing today may have been the turnover battle which Tampa Bay won 2-0. It was not pretty, but the Bucs got the job done and it was enough to secure another division and NFC South banner along with a winning record. Lets get into the top performers and break this one down. Offensive Top Performer: Chris Godwin Look, the Bucs offense was simply not very good in this game. Baker Mayfield was hampered by injuries and missed a few throws, the offensive line was inconsistent and Tampa Bay’s receivers had a few drops. However it was Chris Godwin who had the most productive day out of all the receivers including a few catches down the stretch to clinch the game. Godwin ended the day with six catches for 51 yards that secured a third straight 1,000 yard receiving season. The 2023 season has been a roller coaster for Godwin, but he has come up big down the stretch for the Bucs offense. Defensive Top Performer: Antoine Winfield Jr Who else would it be? Safety Antoine Winfield Jr was not only the top performer on defense this week, but he has been the top performer on defense the entire season. Winfield finished the day with five tackles, one sack and one forced fumble and boy oh boy was it a big one. Yet another elite, impactful play Antoine Winfield Jr. — like he’s done all year— Trevor Sikkema (@TampaBayTre) Nothing but complete ignorance he did not make the Pro Bowl. Easy All-Pro [pic.twitter.com/kao7CilUHz] [January 7, 2024] Winfield finished the regular season with an outstanding 122 total tackles, six sacks, six forced fumbles and three interceptions. He is due to break the bank this offseason and will be worth every penny. Winfield has blossomed into one of the best safeties in the NFL and continues to prove it with each passing week. Still not good enough for the [pro bowl](http://www.sbnation.com/nfl-pro-bowl) though, I guess. Special Teams Top Performer: Chase McLaughlin He was literally the only Buccaneer who put up points today. Seems like an obvious choice. McLaughlin was 3/3 against Carolina including a 57 yard field goal which tied his career high. McLaughlin has been money this year for Tampa Bay, making 29/31 field goals and being a perfect 33/33 on extra points this season. McLaughlin is a free agent after this season and it is apparent that the Bucs need to do whatever they can to bring him back for 2024. At 9-8, the Bucs are set to host a playoff game next weekend. We will have to wait and see how Baker Mayfield’s health holds up and just how the Buccaneers rise to the occasion in the Wild Card round in an effort to continue to defy expectations that many had set for them before the season began.

organizations.name: tampa bay buccaneers week 18 top performers vs. carolina panthers - bucs nation the bucs
